summary: Beauty product website for 'Glow Maxing' - a skincare solution that delivers visible glow and removes blackheads and whiteheads in 7 days
architectural_notes: Focus on detailed product information and benefits presentation
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero background image featuring glowing, radiant skin with soft bokeh lighting effect (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Product packaging mockup for Glow Maxing showing elegant white and gold container (product-main.dim_800x800.png)
- Before and after comparison showing skin transformation with visible glow improvement (before-after.dim_1200x600.png)
- Icon representing facial glow with radiant light rays (glow-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing blackhead removal with clean pore illustration (blackhead-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing whitehead removal with smooth skin texture (whitehead-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a hero section prominently featuring the Glow Maxing product name, tagline highlighting the 7-day results promise, and a compelling call-to-action
Create a detailed product benefits section showcasing how Glow Maxing delivers facial glow and removes blackheads and whiteheads
Implement a 7-day results timeline section that visually demonstrates the product's effectiveness progression from day 1 to day 7
Create a comprehensive product details section with information about ingredients, usage instructions, and product specifications

Design a visually cohesive beauty and skincare themed interface with a fresh, clean aesthetic that emphasizes radiance and clarity, using warm glowing tones, soft gradients, and elegant typography throughout all sections

new_feature_requests.summary: Create detailed product website for Glow Maxing beauty product
Display product benefits (glow enhancement, blackhead/whitehead removal)
